tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited them in 2008 for a filling and it's still intact. When the treatment was done, I was informed that the filling might come out as it was a huge filling.  I keep going for cleaning of the teeth every year and always say can you make the teeth more white, the usual reply is we can but it will come back to normal after somedays you really want to bleach and spend money? This is the honesty that always pulls me to them and I know my teeths are in safe hands

review: Amazing husband wife duo! Very respectful. I was really tired of my teeth and the lack of a glowing smile. They really did such a wonderful job. I was very skeptical before I started looking for a good dentist - did not want to risk anything. But their website had some really informative before and after pictures, which helped me make an informed decision. And I am so glad I went ...
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words . Hope to always provide you with the best of our abilities .

review: They make you feel comfortable and explain what and how they are going to treat you. You are 100% satisfied post treatment. Great job by Dr Kavita & Dr Manish..
